lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Somewhere in the city of Westen, a dream is about to begin...

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Two young players — rivals since childhood — are called to the same academy.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Welcome to the Westen Champions League Academy. I'm Coach Rivera.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: You've been selected because we see something special in you. Don't waste it.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: We won't disappoint you, Coach.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: Speak for yourself. I'm here to win.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Good. A little fire never hurt anyone. Now — let's get to work.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Chapter 1 — First Days

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Before we talk tactics, you need to understand one thing: this is a team sport.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: I know how to play a team sport.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Do you? Because the scouts tell me you took 14 shots last match and passed zero times.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: ... They went in, didn't they?

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Two of them did. Your teammates were open six more times. Learn to read the field.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Coach — what's the plan for the upcoming qualifier?

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: That's what we're here to figure out. Get some rest. Tomorrow it gets real.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Chapter 2 — Rising Pressure

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Word has spread across the league. Westen's new recruits are drawing attention.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: Did you see that scout in the stands? He was watching us the whole session.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: I noticed. We can't afford to have a bad game right now.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Forget the scouts. Play for each other. The rest follows.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: The qualifier is tomorrow. Pre-game interviews, then the match. Be ready.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Understood. We'll be ready.

lines.speaker: Reporter
lines.text: We're live on the sideline with Westen FC's rising stars! How are you feeling ahead of today's qualifier?

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Focused. We've put in the work. Today we show what we're made of.

lines.speaker: Reporter
lines.text: Zhao — last season you were known as a solo player. Is that still the case?

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: People change. I've learned to trust my team. Watch what happens out there.

lines.speaker: Reporter
lines.text: Strong words. Westen fans are counting on you. Best of luck!

lines.speaker: Reporter
lines.text: What a match! Can you tell us what was going through your mind out there?

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: It was tough — they came out pressing hard. But we kept our shape and found our chances.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: I had two shots go wide. Not good enough. But the team pulled through.

lines.speaker: Reporter
lines.text: Coach Rivera, your thoughts?

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Proud of the effort. There's still work to do, but this is the foundation we needed.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: The result is in. Whatever happened today, the journey is only beginning.

lines.speaker: Coach
lines.text: Remember this feeling — win or lose. Let it drive you forward.

lines.speaker: Zhao
lines.text: Next match... I won't miss those shots.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Neither will I. We're just getting started.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: The Champions League road continues. Westen FC presses on.
